mapper.select: select nvl(max(ctcode),'CT00000') from country where ctname like #{ctname}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into tdest(tdcode, ctcode, tdname, tdaddress, tdphoto) values(#{tdcode}, #{ctcode}, #{tdname},#{tdaddress},#{tdphoto})
mapper.select: select nvl(max(tdcode), 'Y') from tdest where tdname = #{tdname}
